ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, if someone spams you in a language you don t know, you will develop that language, too, up to the level that the spammer knows it.  You DON T have to
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, if someone spams you in a language you don't know, you will develop
that language, too, up to the level that the spammer knows it. You DON'T
have to waste a training point on it in the guild. I learned multiple
languages that way from characters of different races, and never spent any
training points on them.

----- Original Message -----
From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 4:29 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Languages


> From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
> I have a friend who is teaching me Elvish. He spams me with a macro, "you
> are learning the Elvish tongue", and I occasionally get a message saying
my
> language skill is improving. But then I noticed that the only language I
> have a skill for, besides common, is Erudian, which is at awful level.
Does
> anyone know if you can learn the other languages if they are not listed in
> your skills? Thanks.
>
> Greg (Kronan)
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> With more than 17 million e-mails exchanged daily...
> http://www.onelist.com
> ...ONElist is THE place where the world talks!
>
